_comment:
this is a sample object, to be filled by the organizer of the event --
-- view this file for extra information https://github.com/b0sc/b0sc.github.io/blob/main/src/components/Data/events.json --
-- change the values only where there is // comments
time: // time in 00:00 AM format, leave empty if not applicable or is an all/multi day event, eg: `11:30 AM`
venue: // Location details, eg `Virtual - Google Meet` or `Birendra Campus, Bharatpur`

mentors.name:
// Name --
-- leave the mentors array empty if there are no mentors, eg: []
mentors.tag: // a tagline, known for, quote etc

guests.name: // Name -- leave the guests array empty if there are no guests, eg: []
guests.designation:
// Software Engineer at Example Company --
-- leave the image field above empty if there is no live image url
guests.tag: // a tagline, known for, quote etc

cover_photo: // live url of the cover photo, you can copy the image path from your facebook post's image or upload it to the server/drive and use the link

links.blog: // link to the blog post or event page
links.social: // link to the social media post
links.registration: // link to the registration page, leave empty if not applicable
